name: io.github.g1ddy/raindrop-mcp-dotnet
description: Raindrop MCP Server implementation in dotnet.

environmentVariables.name: Raindrop:ApiToken
environmentVariables.description: Your personal API token from the Raindrop.io developer settings.

environmentVariables.name: Raindrop:BaseUrl
environmentVariables.description: Optional: Raindrop base URL override for the API.
